meanings.definition: The act of dividing something into two parts.
meanings.sent1: The bipartitions of the cake were uneven.
meanings.sent2: The teacher explained the bipartitions of the class into groups.
meanings.sent3: The magician's bipartitions of the scarf left the audience amazed.
meanings.sent4: The bipartitions of the forest by the river created a beautiful contrast.
meanings.sent5: The artist's painting showcased intricate bipartitions of colors.

meanings.definition: The state of being divided into two parts.
meanings.sent1: The bipartitions of the country led to differing opinions.
meanings.sent2: The clear bipartitions of the room made it easy to navigate.
meanings.sent3: The twins' bipartitions of chores made their daily tasks interesting.
meanings.sent4: The bipartitions of the sky at sunset painted a stunning picture.
meanings.sent5: The book's bipartitions of chapters helped organize the story.
